author: Joseph Zucker
title: Report: NFL Coaches, Execs Reluctant to Have IT in Homes to Set Up Virtual Draft
description: Some  NFL  coaches and front-office personnel have expressed reservations about letting IT members into their homes for fear of spreading the coronavirus, according to ESPN's Adam Schefter...
content:
Steve Luciano/Associated Press
Some NFL coaches and front-office personnel have expressed reservations about letting IT members into their homes for fear of spreading the coronavirus, according to ESPN's Adam Schefter.
